description.lang: AXIS T8344 is a wireless power plug enabling remote on/off switching of lamps and other devices. With its support for wireless input/output connectivity, the power on/off plug can communicate wirelessly with AXIS M5065 PTZ Network camera or other connected Z-Wave Plus controllers, creating a small security solution with less cabling. Thanks to its integrated wireless I/O connectivity, AXIS T8344 enables flexible installation as the relay can easily be moved and adapted to your needs. Designed to act as a repeater, AXIS T8344 increases the distance between the controller and the Z-Wave Plus devices by up to 100m.

Association with 4 nodes (i.e. end devices such as detectors or other lighting switches).This allows the On/Off module to receive commands directly from these end devices without the participation of the controller.
